name: Live Syntax with Alexandra Cárdenas

location.name: The ISRO Studio
location.address: 2nd cross Gundappareddy Layout Chola Nagar, RT Nagar 560032 Bangalore  Transnational

description: Monday, 13.10.2025 to Thursday, 16.10.2025This is a closed workshop by invitation only.Concert details tbc.A 45-minute audiovisual performance where sound and image are composed live through code. Pulsing rhythms, shifting textures, and luminous geometries unfold in real time, revealing both structure and improvisation. Each performance is unique, shaped by the moment and the place. InIndia, new influences and discoveries will flow into the work, opening space for dialogue between code, sound, and context.© Alexandra CárdenasAlexandra Cárdenasis a composer, live coder, and sound artist from Bogotá, Colombia, based in Berlin. Her work brings together composition, programming, and improvisation to create music with code in real time. As an active member of the global live coding and Algorave communities, she has co-founded nodes such as Toplap Mexico and Toplap Berlin. She teaches and performs worldwide with open-source languages including SuperCollider and TidalCycles, and her work has been presented at international festivals, conferences, and institutions. She is dedicated to makingdigitaltechnology\ies and art accessible, inspiring diverse communities through workshops, performances, and collaborative projects.
